aboutpara: Iâ€™m Adams Emmanuel Ojonugwa â€” a passionate backend engineer and AI developer who builds scalable systems that solve real-world problems. I specialize in FastAPI, Flask, and Node.js for backend systems, with experience deploying distributed microservices, integrating payments (Paystack, Flutterwave), and designing intelligent automation pipelines using Celery and GPT models. I love combining technical depth with business insight to create impactful software products.

resume.description: Building data-driven, scalable systems and intelligent automation tools for businesses and SaaS startups.

education.universityPara: Self-educated through real-world projects, documentation, and mentorship. Focused on backend systems, AI, and automation with hands-on experience in product delivery.
